Tampa.Bayshore Christian School:
Bayshore Christian School is a private Christian school in central Tampa, Florida, United States, providing education for children from pre-kindergarten to grade 12. The school was founded as a middle school in 1971 as a segregation academy in response to the court ordered racial integration of public schools.
As of 2012, the school served 226 students, 62 of whom were at the high school level.
